fields.name: How Draw Mermaid And Other Cute Creatures
fields.author: Michael O'Mara Books
fields.description:
From a magical mermicorn and a friendly narwhal to a puppy cupid and a panda cupcake, these cute creations are loads of fun to draw. 

The book demonstrates how to create quirky kawaii-style characters in an easy, step-by-step way that will also have readers coming up with their own cute characters in no time. 

Using simple shapes, illustrator Lulu Mayo explains how to draw each mythical, magical or just plain marvellous creature. 

Her 30 imaginative creations are sure to keep budding artists entertained and inspired to dream up their very own weird and wonderful characters.

Product Information:

ISBN: 9781789290684
Author: Michael O'Mara
Publisher: Michael O'Mara
Format: Paperback
Pages: 64
Dimensions: 23 x 18 x 1cm

fields.name: Art and Soul Love and Kisses Colouring Book
fields.author: iSeek
fields.description:
Just relax with your favourite colouring pencils or markers and create your own stunning garden, floral and natural world images.

You might like to colour selected areas and leave some parts white, or fill the entire picture with lovely colour - it's up to you!

Each picture is packed with gorgeous details to colour!

Product Information:
• ISBN: 9781912754526
• Author: iSeek
• Publisher: iSeek
• Format: Paperback
• Dimensions: 28 x 22 x 1cm

fields.name: Beautiful Butterflies Colouring Book
fields.author: Peter Gray
fields.description:
A delightful colouring-in book for anyone with a love of butterflies. 

The perfect gift for natural history-lovers and budding artists alike, 45 colour reference images are shown alongside clear line drawings ready for the addition of colour. 

The exquisite colour reference illustrations are from The Naturalist's Library, a hugely popular Victorian series edited by the Scottish naturalist, Sir William Jardine (1800-1874).

Product Information:

ISBN: 9781789502701
Author: Peter Gray
Publisher: Arcturus
Format: Paperback
Pages: 96
Dimensions: 28 x 22.5 x 1cm

fields.name: Kaleidomorphia
fields.author: Kerby Rosanes
fields.description:
The second book to feature the most striking images from Kerby Rosanes' bestselling Morphia series. 

A 16-page full-colour section will display some of the most spectacular artworks that have been coloured by Kerby's fans, accompanied by stylistic comments and tips so readers can create their own masterpieces. 

The illustrations featured in the colour section will be repeated in the black-and-white section, to give colourists an opportunity to duplicate the approach, along with other beautiful artwork from Animorphia, Imagimorphia, Mythomorphia, Geomorphia and Fantomorphia for fans to try their hand at. 

The perfect way to celebrate the talent of Kerby and his fans.

Product Information:
• ISBN: 9781912785643
• Author: Kerby Rosanes
• Publisher: Michael O’Mara Books Ltd
• Format: Paperback
• Pages: 96
• Dimensions: 25 x 25 x 1 cm

fields.name: Imagimorphia - An Extreme Colouring and Search Challenge
fields.author: Kerby Rosanes
fields.description:
Following the international success of Animorphia, comes Imagimorphia, a strange and amazing colouring and drawing challenge from talented artist Kerby Rosanes.

Kerby's unique and ground-breaking black-and-white-line style lends the book wide cross-over appeal and will attract fans of all ages.

Animals and people are formed from weird and wonderful objects - a superbly steam-punk inspired owl is created out of cogs, a polar bear emerges from a polluted industrial landscape, a lion's mane is a tangle of thrashing cables, wires and pipes, and a woman morphs from flowers and foliage.

The intricate compositions are filled with mind-boggling detail and there are objects hidden throughout the book to find.

A quirky colouring and search book perfect for holiday, long journeys and relaxed evenings in.

This paperback book has 96 pages and measures: 25 x 25 x 1cm.

fields.name: Acrylic Colour Paint: Set Of 12
fields.description:
A fantastic selection of 12 acrylic colour paints, formulated using selected, high quality pigments and finest binders to give quick drying, flexible and permanent colours.

A great acrylic paint set, perfect for those looking to begin their acrylic adventure!

Product information:
• Crawford and Black
• Fine art
• Artist grade
• 12 acrylic paints

fields.name: Chunky Paint Sticks: Pack of 6
fields.description:
Get creative with this wonderful pack of 6 brilliant chunky paint sticks that are super fun to use –  simply uncap, twist-up and draw!

Smooth, quick-drying and they don't smudge, these paints are great for little hands. 

Product Information:
• Chunky Paint Sticks
• Make & Create
• Pack of 6
• Each measures: 10.5cm

fields.name: Crawford and Black 10 Artist Watercolour Brushes
fields.description:
A complete set of 10 watercolour brushes, used to create your own mastepiece. Brush size from 2-12 (size 12 brush is 12cm long).

Any artist, either professional, amateur or student.

For best results, soak the tips in water for half an hour before use.

Product Information:
• Watercolour Paint Brush Set
• Set of 10
• Artist essential
• Brush size: 2-12
• Size 12 brush: 12cm long

fields.name: Colour Crazy 22 Watercolour Paints and Brush Set
fields.description:
Get creative with this fantastic 22 watercolour paint and brush set!

A brilliantly bright and beautiful set for young children to experiment with, allowing their inner artist to truly flourish.

With so many dazzling colours to choose from, this will entertain your children for hours.

Ideal for:
Perfect for a range of arts and crafts projects, bound to keep your little ones entertained.

Not suitable for children 3 years and under.

fields.name: Crawford And Black Watercolour Paint Set: 20 Pieces
fields.description:
This fantastic watercolour set includes everything you need to start creating your own paintings, from pencils to sketch out your design to a palette for mixing your paint colours in.

Includes:
• 12 x 12ml watercolour paints
• 4 x brushes
• 1 x drawing pencil
• 1 x sharpener
• 1 x eraser
• 1 x plastic palette

A fun to use kit that you can experiment with, the perfect gift for those new to watercolour painting.

Product Information:
• Watercolour Paint Set
• Crawford & Black
• 20 Pieces

fields.name: Graphite Sketching Pencils
fields.description:
This fantastic pack of eight Sketching Pencils, are traditional round wood cased pencils, with leads made from pure graphite and the finest clays.

Includes:
• 6B
• 5B
• 4B
• 3B
• 2B
• 2
• HB
• 2H

Perfect for drawing and detail work, suitable for students, designers and amateur artists.

Product Information:
• Sketching Pencils
• High quality graphite
• Pack of 8
• Handy storage case  
• Measure: 18cm approx.

fields.name: Colouring Pencils: Pack of 28
fields.description:
It’s time to get colouring with this brilliant pack of 28 colouring pencils.

These pencils come in a range of bright colours and are splinter-free, making them a great tool for a variety of kids’ crafts.

Perfect for creating colourful works of art on paper, card and much more. Ideal for use at home and school.

Product Information:
• Colouring Pencils
• Assorted colours
• Make & Create
• Pack of 28

fields.name: Boldmere Watercolour Pencil Set
fields.description:
Add a unique touch to your artwork with this premium pack of Watercolour Pencils.

Includes:
10 x watercolour pencils
1 x graphite pencil
1 x paint brush

Use them wet or dry to achieve a huge range of effects. You can even wash over them with a paintbrush to turn your drawing into a painting.

This set also comes in a handy tin, so you can take your pencils with you, ready for whenever inspiration hits.

Product Information:
• Watercolour Pencils Set
• Boldmere
• Pack of 12

fields.name: Crawford and Black Watersoluble Pencils - Set Of 24
fields.description:
Crawford and Black Watersoluble Pencils - Set Of 24
Create beautiful pieces of art with this great set of Crawford & Black fine artist's watercolour pencils.

Each of the 24 pencils will produce vivid colours and when used with water, the pencils create an amazing watercolour effect.

This great tin is perfect for artists of all levels and a great gift for beginners and seasoned artists alike.

Product Information:
• Water-soluble Pencils
• Pack of 24
• Bright colours
• Handy storage tin
• Measures: 19.4cm x 18cm

fields.name: Scribblicious Colouring Pencils - Pack Of 36
fields.description:
A fantastic set of 36 colouring pencils from the Scribblicious range. With 34 coloured pencils and a gold and silver metallic pencil inside, colours include red, orange, green, purple, blue, black and more.

Perfect for use at school or home, create beautiful pictures on paper, card and more.

Product Information:
• Colouring Pencils
• Set of 36
• Assorted bright colours
• Metallic colours included
• Pencils measure: 17cm
